document_data.name: Esvelle Greengate
document_data.mainbody: Esvelle Greengate was a merchant in [[Ylraphon]] and the head of the local council of merchants in {{yearlink|1373}}.{{cite book/The Rage||3}}
document_data.Description: Though she had hard eyes, Esvelle Greengate was described as a plump, harmless dumpling of a woman. The night of [[Hammer 23]], she was wearing a quilted dressing gown and a nightcap. She had graying, curly hair.
document_data.Possessions: Around her home, she had equipment for pressing fish and rendering it into oil.
document_data.History:
On [[Hammer 23]], [[Dorn Graybrook]] woke her up to inform of the signs of a [[Rage of Dragons]]. She sent an apprentice to rouse the other members of the local council of merchants.

{{stub}}
